test-step.description: When I open submenu Employee Management of parent menu Common
And In Employee Management screen, I click in number 1 record can click
And In Employee Management screen, I click page 2
And In Employee Management screen, I click page 1
Then In Employee Management screen, Table should show 1 is selected

test-group.name: [1] {employeeMenu=Employee Management, parentMenuText=Common, addBtn=Add, empName=Employee Name, empMaxLength=32, email=Email, emailMaxLength=32, tel=Tel., telMaxLength=13, mobile=Mobile, mobileMaxLength=13}

test-step.description: When I open submenu Employee Management of parent menu Common
And In Employee Management screen, I click button with name Add
Then In Employee Management screen, Verify input field Employee Name with max length 32
And In Employee Management screen, Verify input field Email with max length 32
And In Employee Management screen, Verify input field Mobile with max length 13
And In Employee Management screen, Verify input field Tel. with max length 13
